Class FileControler

java.lang.Object
org.Code.FileControler
public class FileControler extends Object
Central utility class for all file-based operations in the library system.

This class reads and writes data for:

  • Books and media (books, CDs)
  • Users and librarians
  • Borrowed items (Borrowed_Books.txt)
  • Loans history (Loan.txt)
  • Fines and prices (Prices.txt)
  • Logged mails and renew requests
It also maintains in-memory lists (e.g. BooksList, UserList) and provides background synchronization logic between files.

Most methods are static and act as helpers for other controllers and UI classes.

    • addBorrowedBook

      public static void addBorrowedBook(String isbn, String name, String user)

    • addBorrowedCD

      public static void addBorrowedCD(String code, String title, String user)

    • unBorrowIfNoFine

      public static boolean unBorrowIfNoFine(String isbn, String username)
      Tries to return (un-borrow) a book for a given user only if there is no fine.

      The method:

      • Searches Borrowed_Books.txt for a matching ISBN and user
      • Checks if the item is overdue (more than 28 days)
      • If not overdue, removes the line and marks the book as available in Books.txt
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN of the book to return
      username - the username of the borrower
      Returns:
      true if the book was successfully returned without fines, false if there is a fine, no matching loan, or an error occurs

    • getLibrarian

      public static User getLibrarian(String username, String password)

    • fillLibrariansDataAsync

      public static void fillLibrariansDataAsync()

    • renewLoan

      public static boolean renewLoan(String isbn, String username)
      Renews a borrowed item for a user by updating the borrow date to today.

      This method searches Borrowed_Books.txt for the first line matching the given ISBN and username, then replaces its borrow date with the current date.

      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN (or code) of the media item
      username - the username of the borrower
      Returns:
      true if a matching loan was found and renewed, false otherwise

    • getEmailForUser

    • updateBookBorrowFlag

      public static void updateBookBorrowFlag(String isbn, boolean flag)
      Updates the borrowed flag of the first book in Books.txt that matches the given ISBN.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN of the book to update
      flag - true if the book is borrowed, false otherwise

    • syncBorrowedStatusOnce

      public static void syncBorrowedStatusOnce()
      Synchronizes the borrowed status of books between Borrowed_Books.txt and Books.txt.

      Counts the number of borrowed instances for each ISBN and updates the borrowed flag for each book line accordingly.

    • searchUser

      public static boolean searchUser(String username)
      Checks whether a user with the given username exists in Users.txt.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to search for
      Returns:
      true if a line with this username exists; false otherwise

    • searchUserAsync

      public static void searchUserAsync(String username, Consumer<Boolean> callback)
      Asynchronously searches for a user and passes the result to a callback.

      Internally calls searchUser(String) in a background daemon thread.

      Parameters:
      username - the username to search for
      callback - a consumer that receives true if the user is found, or false otherwise; may be null
